presentationTable.name: Facts - Service Request Transfer
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics

presentationColumns.name: # of SRs Transferred
presentationColumns.description: Number of SRs that were transferred
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request.# of SRs Transferred

presentationColumns.name: # of Transfers
presentationColumns.description: Number of times the SRs were transferred
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request.# of Transfers

presentationColumns.name: % SRs Transferred
presentationColumns.description: The total percentage of SRs that were transferred. This metric is computed as follows: 100*(# of SRs Transferred/# of SRs)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request.% SRs Transferred

presentationColumns.name: Average # of Transfers
presentationColumns.description: The average number of times SRs were transferred. This metric is computed as follows: (# of Transfers/# of SRs Transferred)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request.Average # of Transfers
